alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Randolph; Terrell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 6:21PM EST until January 03 at 7:15PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Randolph County in southwestern Georgia... Northwestern Calhoun County in southwestern Georgia... Terrell County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 715 PM EST. * At 621 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Edison, or 8 miles south of Cuthbert, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dawson, Shellman, Sasser, Bronwood, Parrott, Pachitla, Carnegie, Bridges Crossroad, Moye, Herod, Randolph Co A/p, Yeomans, Dawson Municipal A/P, Graves, Fountain Bridge, Goffs Mill, Shivers Mill, Aycock Mill, Oakville and Martins Crossroads. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for southwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for southwestern Georgia.
